Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the use of MWBE investments for New York state funds
Summary: Relates to the use of MWBE investments for and aspirational goal of at least twenty percent of each New York state fund, to the greatest extent feasible within the bounds of financial and fiduciary prudence.
LawCode: Add §§177-b, 177-e & 177-f, amd §423-c, R & SS L; amd §§8 & 5, St Fin L; amd §508-a, Ed L; amd §87-i, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, the state finance law, the education law, and the workers' compensation law, in relation to the use of MWBE investments for New York state funds
